   sphinx-quickstart on Mon Aug 10 09:27:59 2015.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to GeoITS's documentation!
==================================

**Geo Issue Tracking System**
 
Develop a system that enables us to track issues with our products.
First idea is to combine a **wiki** with a **map** on which users can draw their problem areas.
 
.. |geoits_dev| raw:: html
 
    <a href="https://github.com/iMilad/geoits_dev" 
    target="_blank">GeoITS Development</a>
 
To start using the Boilerplate, check out the :doc:`requirements` 
and next the :doc:`quick_start`.

---------

   :maxdepth: 2

   requirements
   quick_start
